an9.19:2.3: paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha → paccuṭṭhimha ca abhivādimha ca (s1-3)
an9.19:3.3: paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha → paccuṭṭhimha ca abhivādimha ca (s1-3, pts1), āsanaṃ → āsanañca (bj, s1-3, pts1)
an9.19:4.3: paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha → paccuṭṭhimha ca abhivādimha ca (s1-3), āsanaṃ → āsanañca (s1-3), yathābalaṃ → yathābalaṃ ca (?), upanisīdimha → upanisīdimha ca (s1-3), dhammānudhammaṃ → dhammānudhamma (pts1) | dhammānudhammañca (?)
